title: Kavalai Vendam (2016)
overview: A chef who is separated from his wife decides to win back her love after she lands up at his doorstep asking for divorce.
storyline: Aravind (played by Jiiva) is a flirt who falls in love and marries Divya (Kajal Aggarwal). They have an argument and Divya breaks up with Aravind near a liquor outlet. She returns to his life after a long time only to seek divorce from him. He takes a blank cheque from her and puts another condition for signing the divorce papers. He wants her to live with him in his house for a week and do all the wifely duties such as cooking and cleaning. She agrees to this and the film goes south from there.
